name: Xidol.tech
description: XIdol.tech is a platform that combines SocialFi and DeFi with various GameFi elements implemented in our product. XIdol.tech has an extension that enable users of X.com (formerly Twitter) can nurture a virtual idol right on their browser. When installing Xidol.tech extension, user can obtain their first character for free and start doing mission to earn rewards. Each mission require users to interact with a specific post on X to get rewards, varies from items in game to tokens. Using the rewards, users can upgrade their character to a real NFT and start earning $FID.
